name: @microfox/google-sheets
title: Google Sheets SDK
description: A TypeScript SDK for interacting with Google Sheets.

constructors.name: createGoogleSheetsSdk
constructors.description: Create a new Google Sheets SDK client through which you can interact with the API

internalKeys.description: The client ID for Google OAuth.  You can obtain this from the Google Cloud Console.
The client secret for Google OAuth. You can obtain this from the Google Cloud Console.
The access token for Google OAuth. This token is used to authenticate requests to the Google Sheets API.
The refresh token for Google OAuth. This token is used to refresh the access token when it expires.
The scopes for Google OAuth authentication. This is used to specify the permissions that the client application needs.

extraInfo: Use the `createGoogleSheetsSdk` constructor to create a new client.
